nodes.bodyText: A stylistic change, but can you separate these three calls on their own line?
Is this event check working properly? I know you said in Discord before that it wasn't, but is that still the case? Also, if possible, can you add a space after the if and before the curly bracket?
Nevermind, they were needed in the old code before I used EnumUtils and I forgot to remove them, my bad

I mean both work,
\S is everything that isn't a space, and \w is any letter of the alphabet or number or _
It would be better to follow the rest of the BukkitClasses registered and stick to \\S+
Nitpick, but please add a newline before # -- Heal Reasons --
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1203,6 +1203,17 @@ entities:
 	strider:
 		name: strider¦s
 		pattern: <age> strider(|1¦s)|(4¦)strider (kid(|1¦s)|child(|1¦ren))
+# -- Heal Reasons --

nodes.bodyText: I was referring to returning just "\\S+" lol
Because after renaming it to something different in english.lang I forgot to update the examples
Inconsistency in the use of a, if you want to use it throughout, you should probably have an end crystal and an ender crystal also, right?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -1204,6 +1204,18 @@ entities:
 		name: strider¦s
 		pattern: <age> strider(|1¦s)|(4¦)strider (kid(|1¦s)|child(|1¦ren))
 
+# -- Heal Reasons --
+heal reasons:
+    custom: unknown, custom, plugin, a plugin
+    eating: eating, consuming, ingesting
+    ender_crystal: end crystal, ender crystal

@@ -1204,6 +1204,18 @@ entities:
 		name: strider¦s
 		pattern: <age> strider(|1¦s)|(4¦)strider (kid(|1¦s)|child(|1¦ren))
 
+# -- Heal Reasons --
+heal reasons:
+    custom: unknown, custom, plugin, a plugin
+    eating: eating, consuming, ingesting
+    ender_crystal: end crystal, ender crystal

nodes.bodyText: One last minor thing - you should probably import org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityRegainHealthEvent.RegainReason directly so you don't need to do EntityRegainHealthEvent.RegainReason.x
